pullrequest.title: Fix for bug #13 where lyse did not check for duplicate shots when they arrived at the same time

content.raw: FYI, in the future I think if you say "fixes #13" or similar in the commit message, then when the pull request is accepted, the issue on the master repository will be automatically marked as resolved. We should probably try and do that in the future.
content.html: FYI, in the future I think if you say "fixes #13" or similar in the commit message, then when the pull request is accepted, the issue on the master repository will be automatically marked as resolved. We should probably try and do that in the future.
